pr_title: [7.10][DOCS] Adds UI related limitation to configuring aggs docs

timeline.message: [7.10][DOCS] Adds UI related limitation to configuring aggs docs.

timeline.bodyText: This limitation also applies to the anomaly charts in the Anomaly Explorer, with or without model plot enabled for 7.10.
timeline.author: peteharverson
timeline.diffHunk:

 your detectors use <<ml-count-functions,count>> or <<ml-rare-functions,rare>>
 functions, set the interval to the same value as the bucket span.
 
+If your {dfeed} uses aggregations and model plot is not enabled for the
